moves.1. e3: This Game Began in A Very Odd Fashion.
moves.1... e5 2. c3 d5 3. d4: No Spotted development.Only pawn moves.But Black HAS THE PAWN CENTER.
moves.3... Bd6: Finally A Piece Is In The Game.
moves.4. Bd3 Nc6: The Pivot Square is At d4.
moves.5. Ne2: Protects The pivot square And prepares To castle.
moves.5... Nf6 6. O-O: White Castles.Have You Heard Of The Saying. Castle When You Will ;Or You Must ; But not When You can?
moves.6... e4 7. Bc2 Ng4: Black Wants To Capture The h pawn.White Stops This......
moves.9. f3 Nxh2: A sacrifice To Expose The King.
moves.10... h4 11. fxe4 hxg3+: Black Has Regained The Material. Also White Hardly has Any Development.
moves.13. Kxh1 Qh4+ 14. Kg1 Qh2#: Mate.THANK YOU FOR WATCHING THE ANNOTATED GAME.COME BACK SOON.OH AND 1 MORE THING TO SAY.YOU NEVER  KNOW WANT'S GOING TO NEXT.BYE NOW
